addition.27: * bug. If you want to pass an {@code EnumMap}, with the intention of using its {@code
addition.28: * entrySet()} method, you should wrap the {@code EnumMap} in this class instead.
addition.44: * Wraps the given map into a {@code WellBehavedEntriesMap}, which intercepts its {@code
addition.45: * entrySet()} method by taking the {@code Set<K> keySet()} and transforming it to {@code
addition.46: * Set<Entry<K, V>>}. All other invocations are delegated as-is.
